paragraph: Call today for a free consultation.

detailsData.title: Experienced Legal Representation
detailsData.content: With over 35 years of experience, Craig Burnett provides real value and helps you eliminate your debt.

detailsData.title: Approachable Lawyer
detailsData.content: Mr. Burnett is always available to speak with you personally and will represent you throughout the entire process.

detailsData.title: Fast Support
detailsData.content: Virtualized practice to meet the demand of your needs in real-time.

address: 3558 Round Barn Blvd, Suite 200, Santa Rosa California 95403
subHeading: Your Trusted Partner In A Difficult Time
valueProp: Attorney Craig A. Burnett has been practicing bankruptcy law since 1985 and will guide you through the process with confidence. Call today for a free consultation.

testimonalData.text: Craig Burnett helped me navigate through bankruptcy with ease. Highly recommended!

testimonalData.text: I was lost in debt until I found Craig Burnett. His expertise saved me.

testimonalData.text: Craig Burnett is the best bankruptcy attorney in Northern California. Trustworthy and efficient.
